author: KSR
text: And keep everyone else under there feet... Exploit them... Without any moral responsibility because now it's prescribed by either some influential man or gid himself. #ReligionPoisonsEverything https://t.co/z9oDREsN0r

author: KSR
text:
I hope when people blame Indian muslims 4 what Mughals did in India, they know tht Mughals were Mongolians & not locals. They  forcefully converted locals & some probably converted willingly due to oppressive caste systems here. 
The guys u hate now r not ones who destroyed India
